mapper.insert: INSERT INTO open_recruit ( member_num, or_corporation_name, or_name, or_occupation, or_job, or_location, or_salary, or_eduhigh, or_url, or_deadline ,or_workday, or_careear ) VALUES ( #{memberNum}, #{orCorporationName}, #{orName}, #{orOccupation}, #{orJob}, #{orLocation}, #{orSalary}, #{orEduhigh}, #{orUrl}, #{orDeadline}, #{orWorkday}, #{orCareear} )
mapper.update: update open_recruit set or_corporation_name = #{orCorporationName}, or_name = #{orName}, or_occupation = #{orOccupation}, or_job = #{orJob}, or_location = #{orLocation}, or_salary = #{orSalary}, or_eduhigh = #{orEduhigh}, or_url = #{orUrl}, or_deadline = #{orDeadline}, or_workday = #{orWorkday}, or_careear = #{orCareear} where or_id = #{orId}
update corporation set mt_id = 500 where corporationmember_id = #{corpId}
mapper.select: SELECT mt_name, corporationmember_id, corporationmember_email, corporationmember_phone, recruit_id, corporation_name, corporation_registration, corporation_phone, corporation_registrationPdf, corporation_intro, corporationmember_name, corporation_address FROM corporation c join member_type m on c.mt_id = m.mt_id where corporationmember_id = #{corpId};

select o.or_id, o.member_num, o.or_corporation_name, o.or_name, c.occupation_name, j.job_name, o.or_location, o.or_salary, e.eduhigh_name, o.or_url, o.or_deadline , o.or_workday from open_recruit o join occupation c on o.or_occupation = c.occupation_id join job j on o.or_job = j.job_id join edu_high e on o.or_eduhigh = e.eduhigh_id where o.or_id = #{orId}

select r.recruit_id, r.recruit_name, c.corporation_name, o.occupation_name, j.job_name, r.recruit_location, e.eduhigh_name, r.recruit_salary from recruit r join corporation c on r.corporationMember_num = c.corporationMember_num join occupation o on r.recruit_occupation = o.occupation_id join job j on r.recruit_job = j.job_id join edu_high e on r.recruit_eduhigh = e.eduhigh_id
order by 1 desc limit #{startRow}, #{pageSize}

select r.recruit_id, r.recruit_name, c.corporation_name, o.occupation_name, j.job_name, r.recruit_location, e.eduhigh_name, r.recruit_salary, r.recruit_photo, r.recruit_deatline from recruit r join corporation c on r.corporationMember_num = c.corporationMember_num join occupation o on r.recruit_occupation = o.occupation_id join job j on r.recruit_job = j.job_id join edu_high e on r.recruit_eduhigh = e.eduhigh_id
where r.recruit_id = #{recruitId}

select o.or_id, o.member_num, o.or_corporation_name, o.or_name, c.occupation_name, j.job_name, o.or_location, o.or_salary, a.careear_name, e.eduhigh_name, o.or_url, o.or_deadline
from open_recruit o join occupation c on o.or_occupation = c.occupation_id join job j on o.or_job = j.job_id join edu_high e on o.or_eduhigh = e.eduhigh_id join careear a on a.careear_id = o.or_careear
select m.mt_name, c.corporationmember_id, c.corporation_name from member_type m join corporation c on m.mt_id = c.mt_id
select m.mt_id, m.mt_name, c.corporationmember_id, c.corporation_name from member_type m join corporation c on m.mt_id = c.mt_id where m.mt_id = #{mtId}
